ANU.name: Robert Cope
interest: Biosecurity; Wildlife ecology; Infectious disease modelling; Bayesian inference.
ANU.biography: Robert Cope is an applied mathematican and data scientist, with expertise in applying mathematical and statistical tools to problems in the biological sciences. He has worked on dugong population genetics, transport pathways for invasive species, and infectious disease modelling and surveillance.
